original_text: All these men had married foreign women. They sent them away, together with their children. All these men had married foreign women. They sent them away, together with their children. korean_text: 이상은 모두 이방 여인을 아내로 맞이한 자라 그 중에는 자녀를 낳은 여인도 있었더라

sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들은 이방 여자와 결혼했다.
